insert into MESSAGE_TABLE (FROM_ID, TO_ID, MESSAGE_TYPE, MESSAGE_CONTENT, STATE_OP, TIME_BUILD, COMMENT) values (#{fromId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{toId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{messageType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{messageContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stateOp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{timeBuild,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update MESSAGE_TABLE set FROM_ID = #{fromId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TO_ID = #{toId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MESSAGE_TYPE = #{messageType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MESSAGE_CONTENT = #{messageContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE_OP = #{stateOp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TIME_BUILD = #{timeBuild,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select MESSAGE_ID, FROM_ID, TO_ID, MESSAGE_TYPE, MESSAGE_CONTENT, STATE_OP, TIME_BUILD, COMMENT from MESSAGE_TABLE where MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
